original_title: ボクを馬鹿にしたやつはユルサナイ…告白を断られた僕は今日、あのオンナ教師を媚薬復讐レ●プで恥肉輪姦
overview: Kasui Jun is a beloved and well-liked by everyone female teacher, who happens to also grab the attention of one of her male students.  The young guy very clumsily declares to her, but she flat-out refuses him.  It should have been the end of that, but the guy is also a deranged maniac and his love becomes anger.  She’s so amazing. What a diamond S1 has found.
title: The one Who Made A Fool Of Me Is my teacher… I was rejected for my confession, and today, I’m going to revenge rape that teacher
